about_the_game:
Overview: Explore the Solar System is the first interactive add-on to the award-winning VR Educative experience Overview (“Best Education Experience” at Viveport Developer Awards, Selection NEXT at Cannes Film Festival 2018).

In Overview, everything you see is real - from the orbits of planets to the position of each asteroid and every single star in the background.

In this interactive experience you can move freely in the whole of the Solar System, zoom in and out on planets and moons, align them with the sun to create stunning spacescapes, and pause and resume TimeFlow to study the movement of celestial bodies.

Overview: Explore the Solar System features all planets and their satellites and almost all asteroids known in the Solar System today. It uses scientific data from NASA and other space agencies to create an accurate representation of our Solar System to date.

Every object in the Solar System is made to scale with its correct orbit, trajectory and position.

Key Features:

  • Move freely
  • Zoom IN and OUT of the 8 planets
  • Discover all their moons
  • Pause and Resume timeflow
